homepage.meta.description.message: Ƙarin kayan aikin Thunderbird: Amsa tare da haɗe‑haɗen asali

homepage.hero.subtitle.message: Haɗa da haɗe‑haɗen asali lokacin amsawa a Thunderbird — ta atomatik ko bayan gajeriyar tabbatarwa.

homepage.features.autoConfirm.title.message: Ta atomatik ko Tabbatar da Farko

homepage.features.autoConfirm.body.message: Zaɓi tsakanin ƙara ta atomatik ko ƙaramin akwatin tabbatarwa tare da gajerun hanyoyin madannai masu amfani.

homepage.features.dedupe.body.message: Yana girmama haɗe‑haɗen da suke akwai, kuma yana guje wa maimaitawa bisa sunan fayil — tsabta kuma abin da za a iya hasashe.

homepage.features.skipSmime.body.message: An ware sa hannun SMIME da hotunan cikin jiki (inline) domin amsoshi su kasance masu sauƙi.

homepage.features.blacklist.body.message: Alamomin glob da ba sa bambanta manyan da ƙananan haruffa kamar {code1} ko {code2} suna hana a ƙara fayilolin da ba su da amfani.

homepage.search.tip.message: Shawara: Danna {slash} ko {ctrl}+{k} don bincika takardun bayani.

site.tagline.message: Ƙarin kayan aikin Thunderbird: Amsa tare da haɗe‑haɗen asali
